bug.author: varenc
bug.summary: [Bug] Broken links on the models wiki page
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>Description</denchmark-h>
The links to the base_config.json files for the pretrained models on <denchmark-link:https://github.com/deezer/spleeter/wiki/3.-Models>this wiki page</denchmark-link> are broken. They link to <denchmark-link:https://github.com/deezer/spleeter/wiki/configs/2stems/base_config.json>wiki pages</denchmark-link> that no longer exist. Took me a sec to find the real ones, but I believe those links could just be updated to point to the files <denchmark-link:https://github.com/deezer/spleeter/tree/master/spleeter/resources>in this directory.</denchmark-link>
Below that there's also a link to the releases on "github.deezerdev.com", which I assume should be update as well. (though that one was less confusing) <denchmark-h:h2>Step to reproduce</denchmark-h>
Visit the models wiki page Try to click the link to see a working example of a model json config. Observe the confusing redirect to the wiki home page and weird permission warning from Github

comments.comment: Thank you <denchmark-link:https://github.com/varenc>@varenc</denchmark-link> for pointing this out. I've just fixed the links.
